thread.section_title: UsedLighting.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of UsedLighting.com | www.usedlighting.com
thread.title: Jonathan Gentry

author: Jonathan Gentry
title: Jonathan Gentry
text: I ordered a power/data distribution unit and was immediately notified that it would not be available for another week or so, which was fine, but was given the option of canceling or finding a replacement for my order. I was then kept up to date of when it was to be shipped out not by automated email but by a real person checking on my purchase. It arrived earlier than expected and is exactly what I ordered. The customer service was WAY above any other online sales I have experienced.
